datoCmsKey.name: Amy Ackerman
datoCmsKey.bio: Creative capacity builder, body advocate and Songstrex. As a company member of Honest Accomplice Theatre I have developed and performed numerous pieces and perform weekly withLance Hornes Mondayâ€™s collective at club Cumming. Their solo cabaret Big Kitty in the Big City explores navigating the entertainment industry as a fat performer, and their journey to radical body love and acceptance. They hold B.A.s in Theater and Performance Studies and Sociology and a Masters in Applied Theater.
